H0.text: Which 18th century inventor and founding father of the United States coined the phrase 'time is money'. Thomas Jefferson

H1.text: Which 18th century inventor and founding father of the United States coined the phrase 'time is money'. Eli Whitney

H2.text: Which 18th century inventor and founding father of the United States coined the phrase 'time is money'. Robert Fulton

H3.text: Which 18th century inventor and founding father of the United States coined the phrase 'time is money'. Benjamin Franklyn

A4.text: The text spells his name as 'Benjamin Franklin'.

A5.text: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania Collection of Benjamin Franklin Papers, including correspondence, government documents, writings and a copy of his will, are available for research use at the Historical Society of Pennsylvania.
